definitions.definition: To encumber with a literal or figurative burden.
examples: to burden a nation with taxes

definitions.definition: To impose, as a load or burden; to lay or place as a burden (something heavy or objectionable).

main_definition: ( transitive ) To encumber with a literal or figurative burden.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To impose, as a load or burden; to lay or place as a burden (something heavy or objectionable).
